Package index

Resampling methods

initial_split() initial_time_split() training() testing() group_initial_split()
Simple Training/Test Set Splitting
initial_validation_split() initial_validation_time_split() group_initial_validation_split() training(<initial_validation_split>) testing(<initial_validation_split>) validation()
Create an Initial Train/Validation/Test Split
validation_set() analysis(<val_split>) assessment(<val_split>) training(<val_split>) validation(<val_split>) testing(<val_split>)
Create a Validation Split for Tuning
bootstraps()
Bootstrap Sampling
group_bootstraps()
Group Bootstraps
vfold_cv()
V-Fold Cross-Validation
group_vfold_cv()
Group V-Fold Cross-Validation
mc_cv()
Monte Carlo Cross-Validation
group_mc_cv()
Group Monte Carlo Cross-Validation
clustering_cv()
Cluster Cross-Validation
nested_cv()
Nested or Double Resampling
loo_cv()
Leave-One-Out Cross-Validation
rolling_origin() superseded
Rolling Origin Forecast Resampling
sliding_window() sliding_index() sliding_period()
Time-based Resampling
apparent()
Sampling for the Apparent Error Rate
permutations()
Permutation sampling
manual_rset()
Manual resampling

Analysis

int_pctl() int_t() int_bca()
Bootstrap confidence intervals
reg_intervals()
A convenience function for confidence intervals with linear-ish parametric models

Utilities

.get_fingerprint()
Obtain a identifier for the resamples
as.data.frame(<rsplit>) analysis() assessment()
Convert an rsplit object to a data frame
add_resample_id()
Augment a data set with resampling identifiers
complement()
Determine the Assessment Samples
form_pred()
Extract Predictor Names from Formula or Terms
get_rsplit()
Retrieve individual rsplits objects from an rset
labels(<rset>) labels(<vfold_cv>)
Find Labels from rset Object
labels(<rsplit>)
Find Labels from rsplit Object
make_splits()
Constructors for split objects
make_strata()
Create or Modify Stratification Variables
populate()
Add Assessment Indices
reshuffle_rset()
"Reshuffle" an rset to re-generate a new rset with the same parameters
reverse_splits()
Reverse the analysis and assessment sets
rsample2caret() caret2rsample()
Convert Resampling Objects to Other Formats
rset_reconstruct()
Extending rsample with new rset subclasses
tidy(<rsplit>) tidy(<rset>) tidy(<vfold_cv>) tidy(<nested_cv>)
Tidy Resampling Object

Compatibility

rsample-dplyr
Compatibility with dplyr
